item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Nope, in your objects.CFG just look at the code above and copy it. Change the first numbers to the ID. Then change the next 2, 4-digit numbers to the coordinates.

item.title: Need help with adding objects on dev 7
item.dc:creator: @Enjoi_Sk8 Enjoi Sk8
item.description:
@Enjoi_Sk8 wrote:

in the client.java there is no place to add the makeglobalobject line to add objects so i was wondering if the object.java file was the place to put it heres wats in that file

[code]public class Object {
public int id, x, y, type;

public Object(int id, int x, int y, int type) {
	this.id = id;
	this.x = x;
	this.y = y;
	this.type = type;
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with adding objects on dev 7
